verses.verse: It is not <S%G4851>expedient<s%> for me <S%G1211>doubtless<s%> to <S%G2744>glory.<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3701>visions<s%> and <S%G602>revelations<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

I <S%G1492>knew<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G4253>ago,<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> in the <S%G4983>body,<s%> I <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1492>tell;<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> out of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> I <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1492>tell:<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows;<s%>) <S%G5108>such<s%> an one <S%G726>caught<s%> up to the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> in the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> out of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> I <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1492>tell:<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows;<s%>)

How that he was <S%G726>caught<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3857>paradise,<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G731>unspeakable<s%> <S%G4487>words,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G2980>utter.<s%>
Of <S%G5108>such<s%> an one will I <S%G2744>glory:<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> of <S%G1683>myself<s%> I will not <S%G2744>glory,<s%> but in <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>infirmities.<s%>

For <S%G1437>though<s%> I would <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2744>glory,<s%> I shall not be a <S%G878>fool;<s%> for I will <S%G2046>say<s%> the <S%G225>truth:<s%> but now I <S%G5339>forbear,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man should <S%G3049>think<s%> of me <S%G5228>above<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%> me to be, <S%G2228>or<s%> that he <S%G191>hears<s%> of me.

And <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should be <S%G5229>exalted<s%> above measure through the <S%G5236>abundance<s%> of the <S%G602>revelations,<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to me a <S%G4647>thorn<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> the <S%G32>messenger<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%> to <S%G2852>buffet<s%> me, <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should be <S%G5229>exalted<s%> above measure.
For <S%G5127>this<s%> thing I <S%G3870>sought<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5151>thrice,<s%> that it might <S%G868>depart<s%> from me.

And he <S%G2046>said<s%> to me, My <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for you: for my <S%G1411>strength<s%> is <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> in weakness. <S%G769><s%> <S%G2236>Most<s%> <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will I <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> in my <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> that the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G1981>rest<s%> on me.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I take <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> in <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> in <S%G5196>reproaches,<s%> in <S%G318>necessities,<s%> in <S%G1375>persecutions,<s%> in <S%G4730>distresses<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> sake: for <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I <S%G1415>strong.<s%>

I am <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G878>fool<s%> in <S%G2744>glorying;<s%> you have <S%G315>compelled<s%> me: for I <S%G3784>ought<s%> to have been <S%G4921>commended<s%> of you: for in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> am I <S%G5302>behind<s%> the <S%G3029>very<s%> most <S%G5228>chief<s%> <S%G3029><s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> I be <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G3303>Truly<s%> the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of an <S%G652>apostle<s%> were <S%G2716>worked<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>patience,<s%> in <S%G4592>signs,<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> and <S%G1411>mighty<s%> <S%G1411>deeds.<s%>

For <S%G5101>what<s%> is it <S%G3757>wherein<s%> you were <S%G2274>inferior<s%> to <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1577>churches,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> it be that I myself was not <S%G2655>burdensome<s%> to you? <S%G5483>forgive<s%> me <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G93>wrong.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> time I am <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you; and I will not be <S%G2655>burdensome<s%> to you: for I <S%G2212>seek<s%> not your's <S%G5216><s%>but you: for the <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> not to <S%G2343>lay<s%> up for the <S%G1118>parents,<s%> but the <S%G1118>parents<s%> for the <S%G5043>children.<s%>

And I will <S%G2236>very<s%> <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G1159>spend<s%> and be <S%G1550>spent<s%> for you; <S%G1499>though<s%> the <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> you, the <S%G2276>less<s%> I be <S%G25>loved.<s%>
But be it so, I did not <S%G2599>burden<s%> you: <S%G235>nevertheless,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G3835>crafty,<s%> I <S%G2983>caught<s%> you with <S%G1388>guile.<s%>
Did I <S%G4122>make<s%> a <S%G4122>gain<s%> of you by <S%G5100>any<s%> of them <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> to you?

I <S%G3870>desired<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> and with him I <S%G4882>sent<s%> a <S%G80>brother.<s%> Did <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G4122>make<s%> a <S%G4122>gain<s%> of you? <S%G4043>walked<s%> we not in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit?<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> we not in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2487>steps?<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> you that we <S%G626>excuse<s%> ourselves to you? we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> but we do <S%G3956>all<s%> things, dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3619>edifying.<s%>

For I <S%G5399>fear,<s%> <S%G3381>lest,<s%> when I <S%G2064>come,<s%> I shall not <S%G2147>find<s%> you <S%G3634>such<s%> as I <S%G2309>would,<s%> and that I shall be <S%G2147>found<s%> to you <S%G3634>such<s%> as you <S%G2309>would<s%> not: <S%G3381>lest<s%> there be <S%G2054>debates,<s%> <S%G2205>contentions,<s%> <S%G2372>wraths,<s%> <S%G2052>strifes,<s%> <S%G2636>backbitings,<s%> <S%G5587>whisperings,<s%> <S%G5450>arrogance,<s%> <S%G181>tumults:<s%>

And <S%G3361>lest,<s%> when I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G5013>humble<s%> me <S%G4314>among<s%> you, and that I shall <S%G3996>mourn<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> have <S%G4258>sinned<s%> <S%G4258>already,<s%> and have not <S%G3340>repented<s%> of the <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> and <S%G4202>fornication<s%> and <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G4238>committed.<s%>
